description: Matte stone gradient from neutral sandstone to pale yellow and leaf green, with sage and moss transition beads, taupe earth anchors, and cream echo beads. Two matte-gold spacer rings frame the center bead cluster.
name: Transfusion Bracelet
tagline: Neutral  Yellow  Green  City Current Edition
activationHint: Choose how and when youll actually wear this, not just imagine it.

seal: Seal of Protector  Guard the Flame
description: Burnt copper and deep onyx beads with a single Protector seal bead. Built for those who stand at the front and carry responsibility on their chest.
name: 396 Hz Protector Bracelet
activationHint: Wear with slow breath at the doorway. One decision at a time.

seal: Seal of Flow  Live in Rhythm
description: Forest green, soft moss, and sunrise gold accents with a Flow seal bead. Designed for breathwork, training days, and daily rhythm alignment.
name: 528 Hz Flow Bracelet
activationHint: Use for walks, training, or writing. Sync to your natural rhythm.

seal: Seal of Drive  Fuel the Bond
description: Sandstone taupe and ember accents woven for connection and creative exchange. A quiet reminder to build with others without losing yourself.
name: 639 Hz Drive Bracelet
activationHint: Best when youre building with others or strengthening bonds.

seal: Seal of Seer  Reveal the Light
description: White clarity beads with gold eclipse spacers and a Seer seal bead. For those who already feel the next move long before it arrives.
name: 852 Hz Seer Bracelet
activationHint: Night rituals, planning, vision work, and quiet observation.

seal: Seal of Protector  Guard the Flame
description: Burnt copper / ember-toned hoodie with left-heart Protector seal and curved back text. Built as the primary armor layer for the 396 line.
name: 396 Hz Protector Hoodie
activationHint: Wear with slow breath at the doorway. One decision at a time.

seal: Seal of Flow  Live in Rhythm
description: Forest green / sage hoodie with left-heart Flow spiral seal and sunrise tone logic. Designed for training days and quiet walks.
name: 528 Hz Flow Hoodie
activationHint: Use for walks, training, or writing. Sync to your natural rhythm.

description: Cream, blue, and soft fusion black shoe with subtle frequency marks for nightlife comfort and presence.
name: Fusion Night Shoe
activationHint: Link this to a route or city move. Shoes = paths chosen.

description: Neutral base tee to pair with any frequency bracelet or hoodie. Left-heart core seal and subtle back text.
name: EnTrus Core Tee
activationHint: Neutral layer. Choose the mood youll pair it with.

description: A planned line that maps ages 1 through 18 into a bead path, aligned with growth, safety, and self-respect.
name: Kids Beads 118
activationHint: Align to protection and curiosity, not pressure.

description: A future pack pairing the Transfusion bracelet with a matching tee and footwear layout for full-city movement.
name: Transfusion Set
activationHint: Full mood kit. Use when you want to make a memory.
